intension: Design an Instagram advertisement for a local farming business that promotes their fresh fruits and vegetables. The text encourages customers to shop now.
globalcaption: The image features a man holding a brown box filled with fresh fruits and vegetables. The box contains several broccoli pieces, with some placed near the top and others scattered throughout the box. The man appears to be standing in a field, possibly a farm, which suggests that the fruits and vegetables are locally grown. The scene conveys a sense of freshness and quality, as the produce seems to be in good condition.
keywords: agribusiness, agricultural, agriculture, farm, farming, organic, tb, instagram, insta, ig, ad, advertisement, food, fruits, vegetables, sale, discount, green, local, beige

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a green and white color scheme, with a green background and a white object in the center. The white object is a square, and it has a hole in the middle. The hole is surrounded by a green frame, giving the impression of a green box with a hole in it. The overall design is simple and minimalistic, with the green and white colors creating a clean and modern look

objlayer.objcaption: The image features a man standing in a field, holding a box filled with freshly picked broccoli. The box is placed in his hands, and he appears to be proudly displaying the produce. The field is surrounded by a fence, and the man is wearing a plaid shirt. The broccoli pieces are visible in the box, with some of them being larger and more prominent than others
